# Arrow

-   [arrow.apache.R](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/)

## 安装

[apache-arrow-17.0.0.tar.gz](https://github.com/apache/arrow/releases/tag/apache-arrow-17.0.0)

```{r eval=FALSE}
chooseCRANmirror()
install.packages("~/arrow-apache-arrow-17.0.0.tar.gz", repos = NULL, type = "source")
install.packages("arrow", type = "binary")

install.packages("~/arrow-apache-arrow-17.0.0.zip", repos = NULL, type = "binary")

```

read_parquet()：读取 Parquet 格式的文件

read_delim_arrow()：读取带分隔符的文本文件

read_csv_arrow()：读取逗号分隔值 （CSV） 文件

read_tsv_arrow()：读取制表符分隔值 （TSV） 文件
